Attune [i](Add text based on basic land types among different lands you control)[/i]
When Intrepid Rootwalla enters, acquire a land card.
{R}{G}{W}{U}|Intrepid Rootwalla has base power and toughness 0/1 and has “{0}: This creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.”
